error.timeoutHint: The server took too long to respond. It may be offline or unreachable.
error.cantConnectHint: The server refused the connection or could not be reached.
error.authFailedHint: The server's cryptographic identity could not be verified.
error.serverNotFoundHint: The server at this address doesn't exist or couldn't be reached. Check the address and try again.
error.identityErrorHint: There was a problem establishing the site's identity.
error.protocolErrorHint: The server sent a response that couldn't be understood.
error.genericErrorHint: The page couldn't be loaded due to an unexpected error.

mobileStart.noFavoritesHint: Add bookmarks and they'll appear here as favorites.
mobileStart.readingListHint: Reading List lets you collect webpages and links to read later. Tap the Share button to add the current page.

mobileTabs.closeTabTipBody: Drag any tab upward to close it.

addressBar.title: Address Bar
addressBar.body: Tap to search or type a URL. Swipe left or right to jump between tabs.

seeYourTabs.title: See Your Tabs
seeYourTabs.body: Swipe up on the address bar to see all your open tabs.

bookmarksHistory.title: Bookmarks & History
bookmarksHistory.body: Tap here to browse your saved pages and revisit sites you've visited.

moreOptions.title: More Options
moreOptions.body: Access settings, find in page, and other browser controls.

newTab.title: New Tab
newTab.body: You already know what this is.

welcome.title: Welcome to Eclipse
welcome.body: A browser built for the NWEP peer-to-peer web - where sites run directly on devices, not remote servers.

browse.title: Browse the NWEP Web
browse.body: Type web:// addresses in the URL bar to connect directly to NWEP sites. No DNS, no middlemen.

private.title: Private by Default
private.body: Every connection uses a fresh ephemeral identity - end-to-end encrypted with no persistent tracking.

allSet.title: You're All Set
allSet.body: Start by typing a web:// address in the URL bar or explore what's available on the network.

tour.title: Want a Quick Tour?
tour.body: We'll walk you through the gestures and features that make Eclipse easy to navigate.

settings.homepageUrlActive: Loaded when a new tab opens
settings.homepageUrlInactive: Switch to Homepage mode to use this
settings.searchBookmarksDesc: Show matching bookmarks as you type
settings.searchHistoryDesc: Show matching history entries as you type
settings.browserUiScaleDesc: Scales the tabs, toolbar, and browser chrome
settings.defaultPageZoomDesc: Scales page content when opening new tabs
settings.recordBrowsingHistoryDesc: Save visited pages to your history
settings.browsingHistoryDesc: View or clear your saved history
settings.resetWelcomeGuideDesc: Show the welcome walkthrough again immediately

bookmarkManager.title: Manage Bookmarks
bookmarkManager.noBookmarksRoot: No bookmarks yet. Add one below.
